text: Tevin Campbell (November 12, 1976) is an American R&B; singer-songwriter. He has put out many hit singles. His first hit song was "Tommorow (A Better You, Better Me)" with Quincy Jones. It was number one on the Billboard Hip Hop and R&B; chart in June 1990. He released Round and Round in November 1990. Other songs followed over the next two years. He was born in Texas. ==References== Category:American R&B; singers Category:Singer-songwriters from Texas Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:People from Waxahachie, Texas
title: Tevin Campbell
